abstract: George Papaconstantinou, Greece's former finance minister, is found guilty of removing names of three relatives from Lagarde list, record of Greeks with Swiss bank accounts, but receives one-year suspended prison term.
lead_paragraph: A former finance minister, George Papaconstantinou, was found guilty on Tuesday of tampering with a list of about 2,000 Greeks with Swiss bank accounts, but he was spared prison time.
snippet: A former finance minister, George Papaconstantinou, was found guilty on Tuesday of tampering with a list of about 2,000 Greeks with Swiss bank accounts, but he was spared prison time.
